resource.question: SELECT IF((SELECT cpu_socket FROM cpu WHERE cpu_name='e5200') = (SELECT cpu_socket FROM mainboard WHERE mb_name='p5kpl/1600'), 'TRUE', 'FALSE' )
SELECT price FROM cpu WHERE cpu_name='e7400'
SELECT DISTINCT mb_name FROM mainboard WHERE maker='asus'
SELECT ABS((SELECT price FROM cpu WHERE cpu_name='e7400') - (SELECT price FROM cpu WHERE cpu_name='e5200') )
SELECT cpu_name, mb_name, cpu.price, mainboard.price FROM cpu, mainboard WHERE cpu.price + mainboard.price < 300000 ORDER BY cpu.clock_frequency+cpu.l2_cache DESC LIMIT 1
